#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cmath>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

inline long long int read_num()
{
	long long int n = 0;
	char ch = getchar_unlocked();
	while( ch < '0' || ch > '9')
		ch = getchar_unlocked();
	while(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')
		n = (n<<1) + (n<<3) + ch - '0', ch = getchar_unlocked();
	return n;
}

long long int pow(long long int a , long long int b){
	long long ans = 1;
	while(b){ 
		if( b&1 ) ans = (ans * a);
		a = (a * a);
		b >>= 1;
	}
	return ans;
}
int main() {
	long long int t,i;
	t=read_num();
	long long int n,k;
	while(t--)
	{
	    i=0;
		n=read_num();
		k=read_num();
		while(k>0)
		{
			i++;
			k=k-9*i*(long long)pow(10,i-1);
		}
		if(k==0)
		cout<<9<<endl;
		else
		{
		k+=9*i*(long long)pow(10,i-1);
		//cout<<'k'<<k<<endl;
		if(k%i==0)
		cout<<(((long long)pow(10,i-1)+(k/i))-1)%10<<endl;
		else
        {
            string s= to_string((long long)(pow(10,i-1)+(k/i)));
            cout<<s[k%i-1]<<endl;
            //cout<<s[fmod(k,i)]<<endl;
        }
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
